definitions.definition: In any way or manner whatever.
In any case . Used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement.
examples: I think they’re asleep; anyhow , they’re quiet.

definitions.definition: Without care or tidiness ; recklessly , negligently or randomly .
Thoughtlessly , randomly and without careful consideration .

main_definition: ( manner ) In any way or manner whatever.
secondary_definitions: ( conjunctive ) In any case . Used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement.
Without care or tidiness ; recklessly , negligently or randomly .
( Singapore , Singlish , by extension ) Thoughtlessly , randomly and without careful consideration .
